sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Force mobile device encryption for FedRAMP instances by setting system property "glide.sg.device_encryption_enabled" to true</description> <name>Force Device Encryption for FedRAMP</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[SNC.ScriptableSecurityProperties.forceEncryptionForRegulatedInstance();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-17 02:08:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5250ce015b030010da168d8fa881c78d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Force Device Encryption for FedRAMP</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">2b3434a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fa3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5250ce015b030010da168d8fa881c78d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-02-17 02:08:31</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
